title: Trivia Crack quiz show streaming through Netflix next month
content:
Coming to an Apple TV near you is Netflix’s interactive daily trivia show, Trivia Quest. The show is based off of the long-time popular game Trivia Crack. The series will have 24 questions each day throughout the month of April. The questions will be similar to the ones in the game.

more…

The post Trivia Crack quiz show streaming through Netflix next month appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Coming to an Apple TV near you is Netflix’s interactive daily trivia show, ‘Trivia Quest,’ based off the popular game Trivia Crack.
